comment._content: Looks as if your "Young Farmers" had a lot more fun than ours! See: www.flickr.com/photos/nlireland/4334750955/in/set-7215762...

comment.author: 81376848@N00
comment._content: Surprising to see the word "rodeo" in 1951 NZ. Is there a more natural ANZ word (British, Aborigine, or Maori) for "macho games with livestock"?
